name: Wish Maker
description:
April was going though her keepsake bucket and rediscovered a contract that she and her imaginary friend created. A promise in which she returns a small green ring to him, and in return she'll have any wish she wants granted. 

 There are 5  endings and 1 secret "ending"

**There are a few instances of a flashing lights and screen shaking**

Made for the: HQ_RESIDENTIAL_HOUSE_GAME_JAM 

Made using: RPG Maker MV
